name: Little Bee! - Jam Edition
description:
Buzz! The World needs you! You are the last bee on earth, in a world of peace, and you must keep the flowers alive! Collect Pollen! Avoid Water! Buzz!

Made for the #AGBIC jam, this game is very small, as for the amount of time. However, I plan to expand in in the future with a non-game jam version! So try it out! Tell me what you think! This is not the end for little bee...

Check out the other submissions at https://itch.io/jam/a-game-by-its-cover-2017/entries
